burundi.nemba:
(natural)
- 55 is okay but a bit too coarse
- try like 48 at like 92C

pourover.v60:
24g coffee ground coarsely
20g sugar
400g water at 96C
- 48g bloom
- 288g fast
- 400g slow

alcoholic.espresso martini:
- 60g vodka
- 50g kahlua
- 10g maple syrup
- 36g double espresso
alcoholic.genshu (plum liquer) cocktail:
- 60g genshu
- 30g whisky (Suntory Toki is best)
- 20g lemon lime bitters cordial (red elk)
- 60g yuzu kochi (alcoholic soda, Nippon Chuhi brand)
on lots crushed ice
